casebody.data:
First Department,

March, 1954.

(March 2, 1954.) F. Lawson Bennett, Respondent, v. Stirrup Rest, Inc., Appellant.

Judgment unanimously reversed and a new trial ordered, with costs to the appellant to abide the event, upon the ground that the decision is against the weight of the evidence. No opinion. Present — Peek, P. J., Dore, Cohn, Breitel and Bastow, JJ.
